title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-1.0 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-1.0 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Executive officer means any individual charged with active management and control, in an executive capacity, including a president, vice-president, treasurer, secretary, comptroller and any other individual performing for a person, whether incorporated or unincorporated, functions corresponding to those performed by the foregoing officers. (b) Insurer means a domestic insurer subject to the provisions of section
1403 (c)
of the Insurance Law. (c) All other terms used herein shall have the same meanings prescribed in section
107
and article 16 of the Insurance Law unless the context otherwise requires. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
81-1.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
